blessings.description: A random Player on your Team will be a permanent Earlbird.
blessings.title: Early Riser

blessings.description: A random Player on your Team will be permanently Middling.
blessings.title: Middle of the Pack

blessings.description: A random Player on your Team will be permanently Late to the Party.
blessings.title: Fashionably Late

blessings.description: A random Player on your Team will be permanently Ambitious.
blessings.title: Posterizer

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Bat Crate.
blessings.title: Bats Supply Run

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Cap Crate.
blessings.title: Caps Supply Run

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Shoes Crate.
blessings.title: Shoes Supply Run

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Glove Crate.
blessings.title: Glove Supply Run

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Bat Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Bat Drop

blessings.description: A Random Pitcher on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Cap Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Cap Drop

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Shoes Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Shoes Drop

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Gloves Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Glove Drop

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team gets a Skate Board.
blessings.title: Skate Board

blessings.description: Get Fired Up. Give your Team Fire Blood.
blessings.title: Fired Up

blessings.description: Give your Team Psychic Blood.
blessings.title: Mind Trick

blessings.description: Chaaarge! Give your Team AAA Blood.
blessings.title: Power Chaaarge

blessings.description: Move the Player with the highest Divinity on your Team to the Cleanup spot (the 4th spot in your Lineup).
blessings.title: Clean Up

blessings.description: Move the Worst Defender in your Lineup to the Shadows.
blessings.title: Weakest Link

blessings.description: Promote the Best Hitter in your Team's Shadows to a random position in the Lineup.
blessings.title: Time to Shine

blessings.description: Promote the Best Pitcher in your Team's Shadows to a random position in the Rotation.
blessings.title: Sweet Relief

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Hitting Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Batting Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Pitching Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Pitching Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Baserunning Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Running Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Defense Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Defense Practice

decrees.description: Anytime a Player accumulates 400 Runs (scoring as a baserunner or allowing as a pitcher), they'll earn an Item Crate for a random active Player on their Team.
decrees.title: Goodie Bags

decrees.description: Anytime a Division accumulates 99 Wins, each Team in that Division will receive an Item Crate for a random active Player on their Team.
decrees.title: Gift Baskets

decrees.description: Anytime 3000 Runs are accumulated league-wide, every Team will receive an Item Crate for a random active Player on their Team.
decrees.title: Community Chest

wills.description: Steal a Player from the Idols board. Send a random Player from your Team back.

info.description: Which Idol do you want to steal?

wills.title: Plunder

wills.description: Swap a Player from a Team in the opposite Subleague with a Player from your Team. They must be within 2 combined stars of each other.

info.description: Which team do you want to swap with?
What player do you want to swap for?
What player do you want to send back?

wills.title: Equivalent Exchange

wills.description: Swap a Player from your Shadows to your active roster.

info.description: What player from the Shadows do you want to call up to the active roster?
What player from your active roster do you want to send to the Shadows?

wills.title: Foreshadow

wills.description: Move a Player on your Team to the desired location on your Roster.

info.description: Which Player would you like to move?
Which location do you want to move them?

wills.title: Move

wills.description: Boost a Player on your Team by 15% to 30% in a Stat Category of your choice, but Impair them in a Random other Category.

info.description: Which player do you want to Boost?
Which stat category do you want to Boost?

wills.title: Transfuse

wills.description: Call in an Alternate for a Player on your Team, with a mystery Benefit.

info.description: Which player do you want to call an Alternate Trust for?

wills.title: Alternate Trust

wills.description: Re-roll an eligible Permanent Modification for a Player on your Team.

info.description: Which player do you want to Reform?
Which mod would you like to Re-roll?

wills.title: Reform

wills.description: Pick a modification for your Team next season.
wills.title: Enrich
